knowledge_items.statement: For cancellation from 15 days to arrival, the entire stay will be charged.

source.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

knowledge_items.statement: No refund will be given for early check out.

source.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

knowledge_items.statement: In case of cancellation of the booking once crossed the cancellation period, retention charges will apply as per the contract policy.

source.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

knowledge_items.statement: Check-in time is 14:00 hrs and Check-out time is 11:00 hrs.

source.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

knowledge_items.statement: Room utilized until 14:00 hrs will be 50% off the above rate and after 14:00 hrs full day charge will be applied.

source.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

qa_pairs.q: What is the cancellation policy for bookings at The Dwarika's Hotel?
qa_pairs.ans: Vouchers must be received 35 days prior to guest arrival. For cancellation or modification received between 30-16 days prior to guest arrival date, a penalty of 1 night plus taxes will be applied. For cancellation from 15 days to arrival, the entire stay will be charged. No refund will be given for early check out.
qa_pairs.context: A guest or tour operator inquiring about the cancellation policy for a booking at The Dwarika's Hotel.

metadata.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

qa_pairs.q: What are the check-in and check-out times at The Dwarika's Hotel?
qa_pairs.ans: Check-in time is 14:00 hrs and Check-out time is 11:00 hrs. Room utilized until 14:00 hrs will be 50% off the above rate and after 14:00 hrs full day charge will be applied.
qa_pairs.context: A guest or tour operator asking about the check-in and check-out times for a booking at The Dwarika's Hotel.

metadata.subject: Urgent follow up  40120 amendment Booking Brazilian couples

thread_metadata.subject: Mr and Mrs Randell - GT LL 2 Feb

1739186090604124300.thread_summary: The email thread involves coordination between a tour operator, Mountain Lodges of Nepal (MLN), and a guest regarding changes in travel plans due to an injury. The guests, Mr. and Mrs. Randell, needed to alter their itinerary after Mr. Randell's fall. The thread discusses flight changes, transfer arrangements, and sightseeing adjustments. The tour operator and MLN work together to ensure the guests' needs are met, including hospital visits and sightseeing tours. The email thread discusses the travel arrangements for guests who had to alter their itinerary due to a medical incident. The guests decided to stay longer in Pokhara and requested a change in their flight from Pokhara to Chitwan. The tour operator coordinated with the Mountain Lodges of Nepal and other parties to adjust the itinerary, including transfers and sightseeing arrangements. The thread also covers the issuance of flight tickets and the handling of revised invoices.

thread_metadata.subject: Audley/Mountain Lodges of Nepal - Accommodation contract

1721144963460124300.thread_summary: The email thread discusses the contractual agreement between Audley Travel and Mountain Lodges of Nepal (MLN). Audley Travel sends a new contract to MLN for review, aiming to standardize terms and ensure compliance with statutory obligations. MLN reviews the contract and raises concerns about specific clauses, including indemnity and arbitration. Audley responds with explanations and amendments. The discussion also touches on insurance coverage and future booking arrangements.

knowledge_items.statement: Mountain Lodges of Nepal cannot commit to overrides and marketing contributions unless business from Audley grows significantly.
knowledge_items.applicability: When discussing marketing contributions and overrides

metadata.subject: Re: Audley/Mountain Lodges of Nepal - Accommodation contract
